message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.CY, cs.HC 

This paper is primarily focused on information retrieval (IR) and the evaluation of IR systems using test collections. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IR. The paper also discusses the use of machine learning techniques for topic selection, which falls under the sub-category of cs.CL (computational linguistics). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of deep learning for relevance judgments, which falls under the sub-category of cs.DL (deep learning). The paper also discusses the impact of topic familiarity and construction costs on the evaluation process, which could fall under the sub-categories of cs.CY (computing and society) and cs.HC (human-computer interaction), respectively.
